mapper.select: SELECT s.id as supplier_id, s.`name` supplier_name, (SELECT count(1) from certificate_hospital_business chb inner join certificate c on chb.certificate_id = c.id where chb.hospital_id = hs.hospital_id AND chb.business_type_code = 10) as require_cnt, (SELECT count(1) from certificate_repository cr inner JOIN certificate_hospital_business chb on chb.certificate_id = cr.certificate_id and chb.business_type_code = 10 and chb.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} where cr.target_describe_id = s.id AND cr.business_type_code = 10 and cr.close_flag = 0 and cr.submit_flag = 1) as uploaded_cnt from `mscm-base`.supplier s inner join `mscm-base`.hospital_supplier hs on s.id = hs.supplier_id WHERE hs.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} and hs.inactive = 0

select DISTINCT m.id as manufacturer_id, m.name as manufacturer_name, (SELECT count(1) from certificate_hospital_business chb inner join certificate c on chb.certificate_id = c.id where chb.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} AND chb.business_type_code = 30) as require_cnt, (SELECT count(1) from certificate_repository cr inner JOIN certificate_hospital_business chb on chb.certificate_id = cr.certificate_id and chb.business_type_code = 30 and chb.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} where cr.supplier_id = m.supplier_id and cr.target_describe_id = m.id AND cr.business_type_code = 30 and cr.close_flag = 0 and cr.submit_flag = 1) as uploaded_cnt from `mscm-base`.manufacturer m where m.supplier_id = #{supplierId}

select DISTINCT mc.id as catalog_id,mc.name as catalog_name, (SELECT count(1) from certificate_hospital_business chb inner join certificate c on chb.certificate_id = c.id where chb.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} AND chb.business_type_code = 21) as require_cnt, (SELECT count(1) from certificate_repository cr1 inner JOIN certificate_hospital_business chb on chb.certificate_id = cr1.certificate_id and chb.business_type_code = 21 and chb.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} where cr1.manufacturer_id = cr.manufacturer_id and cr1.target_describe_id = mc.id AND cr1.business_type_code = 21 and cr.close_flag = 0 and cr.submit_flag ) as uploaded_cnt from `mscm-base`.material_catalog mc INNER JOIN certificate_repository cr on cr.target_describe_id = mc.id where mc.parent_id = 0 and cr.manufacturer_id = #{manufacturerId}

select DISTINCT m.id as material_id,m.material_name as material_name, (SELECT count(1) from certificate_hospital_business chb inner join certificate c on chb.certificate_id = c.id where chb.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} AND chb.business_type_code = 20) as require_cnt, (SELECT count(1) from certificate_repository cr1 inner JOIN certificate_hospital_business chb on chb.certificate_id = cr1.certificate_id and chb.business_type_code = 20 and chb.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} where cr1.manufacturer_id = cr.manufacturer_id and cr1.target_describe_id = m.id AND cr1.business_type_code = 20 and cr1.close_flag = 0 and cr1.submit_flag = 1) as uploaded_cnt from `mscm-base`.material m left JOIN certificate_repository cr on cr.target_describe_id = m.id left join `mscm-base`.material_catalog mc on m.catalog_id = mc.id where mc.parent_ids like CONCAT('%,',#{catalogId},',%')

select tmp.certificate_id,tmp.certificate_name,tmp.business_type_code,cr.id,cr.certificate_no,cr.expiry_date,cr.certificate_sign,cr.certificate_sign_to,cr.version,cr.doc_ids,cr.target_describe_id from ( select c.name as certificate_name,chb.* from certificate_hospital_business chb inner join certificate c on chb.certificate_id = c.id where hospital_id = #{request.hospitalId} and business_type_code = #{request.businessTypeCode} ) tmp left join certificate_repository cr on tmp.certificate_id = cr.certificate_id and tmp.business_type_code = cr.business_type_code and cr.target_describe_id = #{request.targetDescribeId} and cr.close_flag = 0 and cr.submit_flag = 1
